about_the_game:
"Super-highspeed-battle" among motorcycles on highways in Asia.
That is the “Ring-shaped FASTBEAT BATTLE RIDER”!
The popular motorbike game in the arcade is back on PC!
Players become original characters, and through leveling up and customization, they can create their "own character" and their "own bike" to aim to become No. 1.
In this game, cars on the highway may get in your way during battles.
Getting caught in cars is very dangerous, but dodging them successfully will increase the player's speed!
Improve your technique and turn a difficulty into an opportunity, and defeat your rivals!

■Story mode

The story consists of 36 episodes.
Defeat the rivals (COM) that stand in your way one after another!

■Time attack mode

Since there are no rivals, improve your driving techniques as much as you are satisfied to reach the fastest course record!

■Battle mode

You can battle with other players! Be the fastest among your friends!

■Customization

Get points by playing the game!
Play in numerous races to level up the machine!
Through customization, not only the performance of the machine, but also the appearance of it can be changed!
Moreover, you can obtain "titles" when you meet specific requirements! Show off your style to your friends and opponents!
detailed_description:
"Super-highspeed-battle" among motorcycles on highways in Asia.
That is the “Ring-shaped FASTBEAT BATTLE RIDER”!
The popular motorbike game in the arcade is back on PC!
Players become original characters, and through leveling up and customization, they can create their "own character" and their "own bike" to aim to become No. 1.
In this game, cars on the highway may get in your way during battles.
Getting caught in cars is very dangerous, but dodging them successfully will increase the player's speed!
Improve your technique and turn a difficulty into an opportunity, and defeat your rivals!

■Story mode

The story consists of 36 episodes.
Defeat the rivals (COM) that stand in your way one after another!

■Time attack mode

Since there are no rivals, improve your driving techniques as much as you are satisfied to reach the fastest course record!

■Battle mode

You can battle with other players! Be the fastest among your friends!

■Customization

Get points by playing the game!
Play in numerous races to level up the machine!
Through customization, not only the performance of the machine, but also the appearance of it can be changed!
Moreover, you can obtain "titles" when you meet specific requirements! Show off your style to your friends and opponents!

movies.name: 環状 FAST BEAT BATTLE RIDER

name: FAST BEAT BATTLE RIDER

subs.option_text: 環状 FAST BEAT BATTLE RIDER - $9.99

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4210 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4000 with 1GB of VRAM (DirectX 10 graphics card required) or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: I will be entitled "the fastest"! Slip between the cars that try to block you on your motorbike and run through the highway in a "super-highspeed-battle'' just like in movies! The more you use the machine, the higher the status will be. Improve your skills and defeat the first Ghost Rider!
